ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | structfun.1 | |- F Struct X |
| 2 |  | #P_isstruct2 | |- ( F Struct X <-> ( X e. ( <_ i^i ( NN X. NN ) ) /\ Fun ( F \ { (/) } ) /\ dom F C_ ( ... ` X ) ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_simp2bi | |- ( F Struct X -> Fun ( F \ { (/) } ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- Fun ( F \ { (/) } ) |
| 5 |  | #P_structcnvcnv | |- ( F Struct X -> `' `' F = ( F \ { (/) } ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- `' `' F = ( F \ { (/) } ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_funeqi | |- ( Fun `' `' F <-> Fun ( F \ { (/) } ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_mpbir | |- Fun `' `' F |
